revised_title: Stochastic Properties of Ion Channel Openings and Bursts in a Membrane Patch with Two Channels
tldr: The authors investigate the stochastic properties of ion channel openings and bursts in a membrane patch containing two channels. They develop an approximate method to calculate the distribution of the duration of runs of single openings, which can be used to determine the number of channels present in a record containing only single openings. This method requires no knowledge of the ion-channel mechanism or its rate constants, making it applicable to various scenarios.
